backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (Recipe, Ingredient, RawMaterial, etc.) and functions for recipe management, production calculation, cost analysis, and dashboard stats with admin authentication and initialization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components and pages, describing routing, authentication, recipe management, raw material integration, and cost calculation features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, cards, and charts using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the application with viewport meta tag, title 'Jeevanam Smart Kitchen Calculator', and script tag loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with protected routes (Dashboard, RecipeMaster, RawMaterialMaster, ProductionCalculator, CostControl) and public login route, wrapped in ThemeProvider with authentication guards.
frontend/src/components/CostAnalysis.tsx: Cost analysis component that validates ingredient costs from Raw Material Master, applies unit conversion (g→kg, ml→L by dividing by 1000), calculates recipe costs with profit margin, and displays breakdown table with error handling for missing costs.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSummary: Dashboard summary component displaying four metric cards (Total Recipes, Total Ingredients, Most Produced Item, Average Food Cost %) using data from useGetDashboardStats hook with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/IngredientCostFo: Displays a table of ingredient costs derived from raw materials used in recipes, with inline editing capabilities that redirect users to the Raw Material Master page for actual updates.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component providing header with branding, responsive navigation (desktop/mobile), and footer with attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation component rendering menu items (Dashboard, Recipe Master, Raw Material Master, Calculator, Cost Control) with active state highlighting and logout functionality, supporting both desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/ProductionCalcul: Form component for calculating production requirements by selecting category, recipe, and quantity, displaying ingredient breakdown with automatic unit conversion (g to Kg, ml to L).
frontend/src/components/ProductionHistor: Displays today's production history in a table format showing time, recipe name, quantity, and cost for each production entry.
Form component for adding and editing raw materials with fields for name, unit type, and price per unit, including duplicate name validation and automatic retry logic for canister errors.
frontend/src/components/RawMaterialTable: Displays a table of raw materials with edit and delete actions, including loading skeletons, empty state handling, and automatic retry logic with exponential backoff for canister stopped errors during deletion.
frontend/src/components/RecipeList.tsx: Displays a table of recipes with their categories, portion weights, and ingredient counts, providing edit and delete actions with loading and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/RecipeMasterForm: Form component for creating and editing recipes with fields for name, category, portion weight, and dynamic ingredient list with raw material selection and quantity inputs.
frontend/src/components/StoreIssueSlip.t: Generates and displays a store issue slip for a recipe with specified quantity, showing ingredient requirements with unit conversion (g to Kg, ml to L), and provides print and PDF download functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Monitors backend canister health by periodically checking responsiveness every 5 seconds, detecting canister stopped errors, and invalidating all queries when the backend recovers from an unhealthy state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend operations (recipes, raw materials, production records) with localStorage-based production history, error handling for canister stopped states, and user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm color palette (terracotta primary, sage green secondary) for light/dark themes, plus print styles for store issue slips and mobile touch target sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CostControl.tsx: Cost control page displaying recipe cost analysis with an alert reminding users to add ingredients to raw material master before calculating costs.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Production dashboard page showing current date, dashboard summary statistics, and production history components.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity authentication and automatic admin setup with retry logic for canister stopped errors, displaying detailed error information and recovery status.
Production calculator page that calculates raw material requirements and displays a store issue slip for the calculated production batch.
frontend/src/pages/RawMaterialMaster.tsx: Raw material master page for managing inventory with add/edit forms, table display, backend health monitoring, and automatic recovery messaging when service becomes available.
frontend/src/pages/RecipeMaster.tsx: React page component that manages recipe creation and listing with toggle between list and form views, supporting recipe editing functionality.
frontend/src/utils/dashboardCalculations: Utility functions for calculating total ingredient consumption, finding top ingredients, and computing total production costs from production records.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates HTML-based store issue slip documents for recipes, formatting ingredient quantities and creating downloadable files with signature sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme settings, typography plugin, and animation utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking an Internet Identity login issue where canister ohbdn-3yaaa-aaaah-a46oa-cai returns a stopped error (IC0408) during authentication.
